definitions.definition: The science of health , its promotion and preservation .
Those conditions and practices that promote and preserve health.
examples: Hygiene is an important consideration in places where food is prepared.

definitions.definition: The property of having an expansion that is guaranteed not to cause the accidental capture of identifiers .

main_definition: The science of health , its promotion and preservation .
secondary_definitions: Those conditions and practices that promote and preserve health.
( computing , slang , of a macro ) The property of having an expansion that is guaranteed not to cause the accidental capture of identifiers .
